triggers.description: Automatically remove the Champion's Resistance effect after damage is taken.
triggers.name: Champion's Resistance (Damage Taken)

triggers.description: Post a creature's Goblin Scuttle ability to chat when an allied token is moved to an adjacent space. Be aware of false positives resulting from a Foundry movement not being the same as having ended a move action.
triggers.name: Goblin Scuttle (Token Moved)

prompt.value: Your ally has moved into an adjacent space, possibly ending their move action there. Do you want to use Goblin Scuttle?

triggers.description:
Add persistent fire damage to a creature within @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AspA30tzKCHFWRf0]{Incendiary Aura} that takes fire damage.

Note: Due to a current limitation, this trigger will only work when the primary damage type is fire. This covers most cases, but be aware that some instances of fire damage will be missed.
triggers.name: Incendiary Aura (Damage Taken)

triggers.description: Post the Intense Heat ability to chat when a creature enters the aura. If you have PF2e Toolbelt's Target Helper feature enabled, the message will have the triggering creature as its target as well.
triggers.name: Intense Heat (Aura Entered)

triggers.description: Post the Intense Heat ability to chat when a creature starts their turn in the aura. If you have PF2e Toolbelt's Target Helper feature enabled, the message will have the triggering creature as its target as well.
triggers.name: Intense Heat (Turn Started)

triggers.description:
Reduce the duration of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Mountain Resilience}'s effect by 1 minute each time the beneficiary of the spell is hit by an attack that deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.

Note: Due to a current limitation, this trigger will only work when the primary damage type is bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing. This covers most cases, but be aware that some instances of fire damage will be missed.
triggers.name: Mountain Resilience (Attack Rolled)

triggers.description: Roll @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZL97DcoJ8us6EwAF]{Shields of the Spirit}'s damage when an ally within the champion's aura is attacked. The champion must have the spell's effect on them.
triggers.name: Shields of the Spirit (Attack Rolled)

triggers.description:
Roll a kineticist's Thermal Nimbus damage when a creature enters their kinetic aura.

If you have Safe Elements, you can designate a party member to be unaffected by this trigger by dragging the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.p4SCBtIYPzVQ0gEd]{Aux Effect: Safe Elements} effect onto them from the kineticist's sheet.
triggers.name: Thermal Nimbus  (Aura Entered)

triggers.description:
Roll a kineticist's Thermal Nimbus damage when a creature starts its turn in their kinetic aura.

If you have Safe Elements, you can designate a party member to be unaffected by this trigger by dragging the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.p4SCBtIYPzVQ0gEd]{Aux Effect: Safe Elements} effect onto them from the kineticist's sheet.
triggers.name: Thermal Nimbus (Turn Started)

triggers.description: Roll @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.nnSipUPNd3sm5vYL]{Vibrant Thorns}' damage when the beneficiary of the spell is hit with an unarmed attack, or a melee attack by an adjacent creature.
triggers.name: Vibrant Thorns (Attack Rolled)

triggers.description: Remove the Ravel of Thorns penalty when a creature leaves the kineticist's kinetic aura.
triggers.name: Ravel of Thorns (Aura Left)

triggers.description: Send an ability to chat. The ability's slug and its origin are set in the parent trigger.
triggers.name: Send Ability to Chat
